channel.title: [PI] shop Search [PI]
channel.description:
well I want to make a search button in my shop. So if u click on it, it finds your item in that shop.
But i didn't found any tutorial about it. And I've no idea how to make ;(
If there's a pro who can help me, please answer :P

item.title: [PI] shop Search [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I forgot banks got it ! thank u very much.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] shop Search [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Deductive reasoning will get you a long ways…

Think of something that already utilizes this feature. Hmm, banks! Now, there are tons of tutorials on this, so I’m not even going to bother helping you with that…

Anyways, now that you have a system for it, how is it used? Oh, yes, you click a button when you’re utilizing your personal bank. So, add a new action button onto your shop that loads the bank system and have it loop all items of that shop rather then the players bank.

Read full topic
